project.name: J-C789A-LUCE-07-ST03-DT02-DF12-CF25-01
project.description: This test takes a number from the user, and attempts to allocate, initialize, and print out an array of that size. If the number is too large, memory allocation will fail and the program will subsequently crash.

iopair.name: J-C789A-LUCE-07-ST03-DT02-DF12-CF25-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="2000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
